TITLE: Academic Integrity
DEF: A commitment to truth as a condition of membership in an academic community
TASK: The Academic Integrity pattern fosters honesty and fairness in educational environments, emphasizing transparent communication, providing clear plagiarism, cheating, and collusion guidelines, and offering resources for proper citation and research skills development. For successful implementation, a community-wide commitment to integrity is necessary, alongside an open dialogue about the value of intellectual honesty.
